content.html: People outside hear about hyperfocus and think it sounds great. Yay look at that concentration! But all this is more like an exorcism really. Dealing with an intrusive thought I didn't pick, that won't leave me alone until I've exhausted it — like a toddler on a sugar binge.
content.value:
People outside hear about hyperfocus and think it sounds great. Yay look at that concentration!

But all this is more like an exorcism really. Dealing with an intrusive thought I didn't pick, that won't leave me alone until I've exhausted it — like a toddler on a sugar binge.
